text:
JUST IN: Victory Liner lays off 309 probationary employees -- including drivers, conductors, and cashiers in ticketing booths-- citing losses due to the coronavirus crisis. 

Some 100 employees were also asked to retire. | via @arraperezDZMM https://t.co/3N3CWMcZK0

entity.name: Updates on the Covid-19 situation in the Philippines
entity.description: This page provides real-time updates on the Covid-19 situation from trusted and official sources.
